definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In fact, the capital of Mali, Bamako, means "place of the crocodiles" in the Bambara language.
sentences.chinese: 首都巴馬科在班巴拉語中意指鱷魚之地。

sentences.english: The picture shows the Bamako Convention Building.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲馬裏巴馬科會議大廈。

sentences.english: Even in Bamako, the capital city, Mali is thoroughly under-developed.
sentences.chinese: 其實在首都巴馬科，馬裏依然顯得欠發達。

sentences.english: A city of central Mali near the Niger River northeast of Bamako.
sentences.chinese: 馬裏中部一城市，靠近尼日樂河，位於巴馬科東北部。

sentences.english: A busy street in the middle of Bamako, Mali.
sentences.chinese: 圖中是馬面共跟國巴馬科市中心的一條繁閒的街講。
